[SpaceWeb](https://spaceweb.eu/) is a brand of IST-ONLINE Marketing Kft. , a registered business in Miskolc, Hungary. Our company established in 2007, but we started to offer Shared Hosting Plans since 2013. We provide quality Shared Hosting with Special Features. 
|[Company Details](https://spaceweb.eu/company_background.pdf)|
